{{Outdated feature|edition=bedrock}}
[[File:items-opaque.tga|thumb|<samp>items-opaque.tga</samp> in [[Pocket Edition v0.14.3 alpha|v0.14.3]], the last version to actually use this file.]]

'''<samp>items-opaque.tga</samp>''' was a [[texture atlas]] found inside <samp>minecraft.apk</samp> used for storing textures of items.

== Format ==
{{mono|items-opaque.tga}} is a fixed-width 512×512-pixel file that is split into different 16×16 squares which correspond to the texture of each item found in-game.
